consent.title: Consent Required
consent.message: By sharing this image, you consent to it being posted on our Instagram. Note: Images may be graphic.

a11y.understandHint: Tap to consent to posting the image on Instagram
a11y.cancelHint: Tap to cancel and not post the image

permissions.camera: Allow Dead Ahead Bingo to access your camera to capture roadkill evidence for the leaderboard.
permissions.photos: Allow Dead Ahead Bingo to save your roadkill photos to your device.
permissions.savePhotos: Allow Dead Ahead Bingo to save photos to your photo library.

instagram.consentRequired: Consent required to share to Instagram

errors.cameraPermission: Camera permission is required to take photos
errors.photoSaveError: Failed to save photo to gallery
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
